import React from 'react' import logo from './static/Header Logo.png' import MetamaskButton from './static/Metamask btn.png' import WalletConnectButton from './static/Wallet Connect btn.png' import TronLinkButton from './static/Tron Link btn.png' import HamBurger from './static/Hamburger.png' import './static/fonts/JuraMedium.ttf'; import './Navbar.css' function Navbar(props) { return (
{props.accounts?
{props.usdtBalance} {props.symbol}
:null}
{props.accounts?

{props.accounts[0].slice(0,5)+".."+props.accounts[0].slice(-4)}

:
}
) } export default Navbar
